text: læa meux phwk khea di xxk pi pracay hna kab yalut læa phirphl khxng khea læw phwk khea k klaw wa xo phracea khxng phwk kha phraxngkh pord thrng prathan khwam xdthn hı kæ phwk kha phraxngkh dwy theid læa pord thrng hı mankhng sung thea khxng kha phraxngkh læa pord thrng chwy phwk kha phraxngkh hı chna henux phwk ptiseth sraththa thanghlay
